entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
